Header.title: May We Never Forget Our Heroes
Header.paragraph: Each and every sacrifice remembered, heros martyrs forever embedded in our heart and souls

About.paragraph: We are a group of young professionals that want to help the world become a better place. We use our technical skills to help register the entire casuality of this world's wars

Services.name: Hero Registration
Services.text: Heros need to be remembered and we need some where to store their amazing stories.

Services.name: Stories and Testimonies
Services.text: We have a large number of stories for you to browse through.

Services.name: Real Time Reporting
Services.text: We provide real time data through a secure api to our clients that has been recorded by the public

Services.name: Projects
Services.text: Check our real world projects that are helping the war throne Regions of Tigray .

Services.name: Donations and Support
Services.text: Use one of our donation links to help support our cause, which in turn will help us in a number of ways.

Services.name: Public Training
Services.text: We train and give access to our real time data, in order to educate and resolve the current mind set and mentality of war mongering individuals.

Testimonials.text: "One of the best ideas I have ever heard, in addition to the implementation, I am amazed at the projects and donations you guys have done. Keep it up."

Features.title: Hero Registration
Features.text: Heros need to be remembered and we need some where to store their amazing stories..

Features.title: A Hero's Story
Features.text: We have a large number of stories for you to browse through, these are real and are the ones that show real goodness in the world.

Features.title: A Hero's Testimony
Features.text: Real world accounts of the brutality of war can be read here.It is one of the worst testimonies you would find on the internet, but at least its true.

Features.title: Project Management
Features.text: Allows the user to manage his/her projects and donation links.
